channel.title: Best/worst gaming story line/story mode (Recently released!)
channel.description:
Hi, I'd like to discuss some good video game story lines in here. I myself could care less about online play, because I hate it. I love myself a good game with a really good story line.
I'd also like to keep the obvious ones out of discussion, like Call Of Duty, and Halo, because pretty much everyone has a different opinion on them. I recently played bought a game called "Red Dead Redemption" and although it was a pretty good game overall, there was basically no story line to it. All you did was do some missions for people, and get fucked over in the end, so it was kinda disappointing. My favorite story line has to have a game called "Gun" It was a very old game, a lot like Red dead for that matter, but the story line actually made sense, there were actually twists in it, not some bullshit where you're practically someones bitch...
Anyways, lets discuss some games with bad story lines, and good story lines.

item.title: Best/worst gaming story line/story mode (Recently released!)
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

Travas:

I always loved the storyline for Grand Theft Auto: Vice City

Not much of an interest in Grand Theft Auto, i have gta 4 and i just get on to fight random people on the streets.

Read full topic

I always loved the storyline for Grand Theft Auto: Vice City
[/quote]

There’s a storyline to that? I just used to kill hookers with a baseball bat.[/quote]
And with cars

item.title: Best/worst gaming story line/story mode (Recently released!)
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

You can MAKE your own story line in Minecraft

But in all seriousness, allot of games today don’t have a story line, instead we now have a thing called First person shooters. If you want one of my favorite, and actually really long and challenging, games, then I would say LA Noire by Rockstar Games. It’s graphics are the best I’ve seen in a long time.

Read full topic

item.title: Best/worst gaming story line/story mode (Recently released!)
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

[quote=“Daginith, post:29, topic:435846”][quote author=vManlyMan link=topic=538567.msg3940785#msg3940785 date=1331406795]

Read a book if you’re looking for storylines. (Hunger games books are 3 out of the 4 books I’ve actually enjoyed reading in my life).

Isnt there a movie coming out for the book? I bet they screwed it up. I loved those books.

Yeah. But it actually looks pretty good. I just wish they picked someone a little more attractive to play Katniss.
[/quote]
I just watched a trailer of it, it seems ok.

and her? >.>
[img]http://www.moviesonline.ca/wp-content/uploads/2011/04/hunger-games1.j[/img[/quote]
EDIT:It’s not letting me post what I want to…

What I was tryign to say is; That picture is basically all photoshop.

Read full topic

item.title: Best/worst gaming story line/story mode (Recently released!)
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

[quote=“Travas, post:13, topic:435846”][quote author=SilentCJ link=topic=538567.msg3940664#msg3940664 date=1331401852]

I just completed Gears of War 3 last night, played it for about 7 hours straight yesterday and about 7 hours the day before. Probably tied with Half Life 2 series on the best story I have ever played.

Oh and Far Cry 2 was pretty shocking for the story.

Not a fan of Gears of Wars, just doesn’t interest me for some reason.

Everything about it was just epic, graphics, emotional bits, general enormousness, almost cried numerous times :o
[/quote]Is GOW3 really that good? I own GOW and GOW2, and they had pretty good story lines, is GOW3 better?[/quote]
It’s said to be the best of the 3 of all the people I know who own it, it improves on most things and doesn’t go shitter and add pointless stuff like most other game franchises do. I’d say get it, it only cost me £13 :3

Read full topic
item.source: Best/worst gaming story line/story mode (Recently released!)

item.title: Best/worst gaming story line/story mode (Recently released!)
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“Travas, post:16, topic:435846”][quote author=Daginith link=topic=538567.msg3940675#msg3940675 date=1331402379]

[quote author=Acorn_ link=topic=538567.msg3940674#msg3940674 date=1331402351]

I just completed Gears of War 3 last night, played it for about 7 hours straight yesterday and about 7 hours the day before. Probably tied with Half Life 2 series on the best story I have ever played.

Oh and Far Cry 2 was pretty shocking for the story.

Not a fan of Gears of Wars, just doesn’t interest me for some reason.

Everything about it was just epic, graphics, emotional bits, general enormousness, almost cried numerous times :o
[/quote]Is GOW3 really that good? I own GOW and GOW2, and they had pretty good story lines, is GOW3 better?

I tried playing GOW3 and got bored of it pretty fast.

Same here.
[/quote]I thought it was pretty gay until I started playing. It’s a lot better if you start from the beginning so you know what’s going on, makes the game a lot better.[/quote]
The beginning. That’s usually where i start.

Read full topic
